That new photo has been finally published though!
It's in the "Rekishi Dokuhon" magazine's december issue and I put 
Amazon.jp link here.
http://www.amazon.co.jp/exec/obidos/ASIN/B000678JHS/qid=1099500083/sr=1-1/ref=sr_1_8_1/249-8723370-8545105

I'll check it tomorrow in book shop.

I put again a helpful link of How to buy Japanese books on Amazon.jp
http://imaginatorium.org/books/aj.htm
And here is the link to the sound track CD of NHK Shinsengumi for those 
who interested in.

http://www.amazon.co.jp/exec/obidos/ASIN/B00018WKLI/qid=1099500621/sr=1-1/ref=sr_1_10_1/249-8723370-8545105

The purchase system for CD works exactly as same as books.
